column4: what do i do when i get this .... Package libdvdcss2 is not available, but is referred to by another package.
what do i do when i get this .... Package libdvdcss2 is not available, but is referred to by another package.
i need to get libdvdcss2 .. i cant seem to get it from medibuntu
i need to get libdvdcss2 .. i cant seem to get it from medibuntu
why can't you get it from medibuntu?
well i added the repository and stuff .. all went fine .. and when i sudo apt-get install libdvdcss2 it says it cannot find it
did you update after adding the repository?
how do i update ?
i mean you can install VLC, and it should work w/o issue, but i don't understand why medibuntu isn't working for you
it says GPG error: http://packages.medibuntu.org hardy Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 2EBC26B60C5A2783
did you add the gpg key?
i did install vlc .. it doesnt work :(
did you add medibuntu's gpg key.... it looksl ike thats your problem
i added the gpg key too .. read that entire page did exactly what it asked for hardy
should i also remove non free ??
no.. maybe medibuntu is down right now, i really don't know.
i think its down too actually ... how do i recheck ?
well, usualy sudo apt-get update will return errors if its down... like connnection timed out, or something like that
thats the error i get -> W: GPG error: http://packages.medibuntu.org hardy Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 2EBC26B60C5A2783
well that looks like you didn't add the GPG key
im quite sure i did .. hold on lemme do it again
same error when i do the gpg key thing
